evidence.text: 31 | 2025-07-15 | Response to Motion for Preliminary Injunction 7 . Filed by All Defendants. (Martin, Sean) (Entered: 07/15/2025)

extracted.value: All Defendants filed a Response to Plaintiffs' Motion for Preliminary Injunction on July 15, 2025, opposing the motion.

evidence.text: 7 | 2025-06-25 | Motion for Preliminary Injunction . Oral Argument requested. Filed by All Plaintiffs. (Sortun, Anna) (Entered: 06/25/2025)

extracted.value: All Plaintiffs filed a Motion for Preliminary Injunction on June 25, 2025, requesting oral argument and seeking a stay and preliminary injunction under 5 U.S.C. § 705.

evidence.text: 6 | 2025-06-11 | Amended Complaint for Injunction and Declaratory Relief. Filed by Federation of State Humanities Councils, Oregon Council for the Humanities against Amy Gleason, Michael McDonald, National Endowment for the Humanities, United States DOGE Service (Attachments: # 1 Attachment Redline Comparison of Complaints). (Sortun, Anna) (Entered: 06/11/2025)

extracted.value: Federation of State Humanities Councils and Oregon Council for the Humanities filed an Amended Complaint for Injunction and Declaratory Relief on June 11, 2025, against Amy Gleason, Michael McDonald, National Endowment for the Humanities, and United States DOGE Service.

evidence.text: 27 | 2025-07-07 | Brief of Amicus Curiae States in Support of Plaintiffs' Motion for Preliminary Injunction. Filed by State of Maryland, State of Oregon, State of Washington. (Related document(s): Motion for Preliminary Injunction 7 .) (Howell, Coby) (Entered: 07/07/2025)

extracted.value: State of Oregon, State of Maryland, and State of Washington filed a Brief of Amicus Curiae in Support of Plaintiffs' Motion for Preliminary Injunction on July 7, 2025, supporting the plaintiffs' request for a preliminary injunction under 5 U.S.C. § 705.
